ess-beta-metadata.label: Gigabit capable broadband
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Percentage of premises that have coverage from a gigabit-capable service (download speeds of 1,000 Mbps or more)
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage of premises that have coverage from a gigabit-capable service (download speeds of 1,000 Mbps or more), in the UK, as of July 2025.
ess-beta-metadata.caveats: Some of this data has been aggregated and may show differences to other published figures.
